entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
